entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saint-Quentin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 AM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High zero.
